metadata.title: CVE-2017-6197 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The r_read_* functions in libr/include/r_endian.h in radare2 1.2.1 allowremote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference andapplication crash) via a crafted binary file, as demonstrated by ther_read_le32 function.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
